alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Greene (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 9:14PM EDT until August 12 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR EASTERN GREENE...WEST CENTRAL FAYETTE AND NORTH CENTRAL MONONGALIA COUNTIES... At 914 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waynesburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Waynesburg, Masontown, Fairdale, Jefferson Boro, Granville, Cassville, Bobtown, Nemacolin, Carmichaels, Blacksville, Mount Morris, Spraggs, Pentress, Wana, Osage, Brave, Daybrook, Georgetown, and Core. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
